title: Lionel Messi isn't expected to be back with PSG until early January after World Cup success
text: Lionel Messi isn't expected to be back with Paris Saint-German until the "2nd or 3rd January," according to the the club's coach Christophe Galtier as the 35-year-old continues to spend time back in Argentina after winning the World Cup following the penalty shootout victory over France in the final.

title: Lionel Messi: PSG confirm when they expect World Cup winner to return
text: World Cup winner Lionel Messi will make his return to Paris Saint-Germain at the beginning of January. The Argentine forward, seven-times Ballon D'Or winner, scored two goals to lead his country to victory over France on penalties in the World Cup final nine days ago.
